name: AD
description: The name of the sender (ex. PAN for Panama, FR for France).

name: IR
description: Unique vessel number attributed by the flag-State

name: RC
description: International Radio Call Sign (IRCS) of the observed/sighted vessel

name: XR
description: Side (hull) number of registration of the vessel

name: DA
description: Date of reported event (year, month, day in UTC)

name: TI
description: Time of reported event (hour, minute in UTC)

name: LT
description: Latitude expressed in degrees and decimals (WGS-84)

name: LG
description: Longitude expressed in degrees and decimals (WGS-84)

name: RN
description: Record number: Serial number of retransmission of the message/report by the FMC (annual count)

name: SQ
description: Serial number of the message/report as transmitted by the vessel (annual count).
